mdException.name: dss.vector.solutions.form.MdFormHasInstancesException
mdException.label: MdForm Has Instances Exception
mdException.description: Thrown when a delete is requested for an MdForm with instances
mdException.message: The form [{mdFormDisplayLabel}] cannot be deleted if data entered into it is present.

mdException.name: dss.vector.solutions.form.ConfirmDeleteMdFormException
mdException.label: Confirm Delete MdForm Exception
mdException.description: Thrown when a delete is requested for an MdForm
mdException.message: Are you sure you want to delete the form [{mdFormDisplayLabel}]?

mdException.name: dss.vector.solutions.form.ConfirmDeleteMdFieldException
mdException.label: Confirm Delete MdField Exception
mdException.description: Thrown when a delete is requested for an MdField
mdException.message: Are you sure you want to delete the field [{mdFieldDisplayLabel}] from form [{mdFormDisplayLabel}]?
